long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeping track of all our usernames and passwords can be a challenge. Hyperpass makes it easy to access all your account information in one place on any device. Thanks to our transparency and strict security policy, you can be sure your information is safe. Your sensitive data is always encrypted before it leaves your device, and the only one with the keys to unlock it is you.
